General.Name: Hubei Dinglong Chemical
General.Description: Hubei Dinglong CO.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and service of integrated circuit chip design, semiconductor process materials, advanced semiconductor packaging materials, semiconductor display materials, and printing and copying general consumables. The company offers general consumables, such as charging and developing rollers, ASIC-SOC chips, color polymeric toners, magnetic carriers, glues, ink cartridges, and universal toner cartridges. It also provides optoelectronic semiconductor materials, including cleaning fluid, polishing pads for integrated circuits, and flexible display substrate materials. The company was formerly known as Hubei Dinglong Chemical Co., Ltd and changed its name to Hubei Dinglong CO.,Ltd. in September 2016. Hubei Dinglong CO.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuhan, China.
